design.custom_css: ion-header{ position:relative; background-color:#1a1b20; padding-bottom:30px; } .iphoneX-portrait .scroll-content{ top:30px; } .has-refresher > .scroll-content{ border-top:none; } .title, .header-logo { display: none; } .header:before { width: 150px; content: ""; background-image: url(assets/header-logo.png); height: 65px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center top; z-index: 100; position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; margin: auto; margin-top: constant(safe-area-inset-top); margin-top: env(safe-area-inset-top); } @font-face { font-family: 'Raleway'; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; src: local('Raleway'), local('Raleway-Regular'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/raleway/v11/0dTEPzkLWceF7z0koJaX1A.woff2) format('woff2'); unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2212, U+2215; } @font-face { font-family: 'Oswald'; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; src: local('Oswald Regular'), local('Oswald-Regular'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/oswald/v11/pEobIV_lL25TKBpqVI_a2w.woff2) format('woff2'); unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2212, U+2215; } ion-card-content{ background-color:#222329; } ion-card-content p{ display:none; } .card-title{ margin-top:-15px; } .card-title h2 ::after{ margin-top:-50px; } .card-title h2{ color:white; z-index:999; position:relative; font-family: Oswald; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 17px; } ion-card::after { display: block; position: relative; background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent 0%, #222329 70%); margin-top: -180px; height: 170px; width: 100%; content: ''; } .custom-date{ color:#9c9c9c; font-size: 13px; font-family: Oswald; } h2{ position:relative; font-family: Oswald; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 23px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 25px; } .selection p{ font-family: Raleway; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; } .selection a{ color:red; } .i-framebox{ width:275px; height:250px; background-color:silver; color:white; } .post-list ion-slides .slide-title{ font-family: Oswald; text-transform: uppercase; } .menu-inner ion-list .item-md, .menu-inner ion-list .item-ios, .menu-inner ion-list p { font-family: Oswald; text-transform: uppercase; } .amp-leader-holder{ width:728px;height:90px;margin:auto; } @media screen and (min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 749px) { .ads-wrapper { width: 583px; margin: auto; } .ads-responsive { transform: scale(0.8); transform-origin: 0; } } @media screen and (min-width: 525px) and (max-width: 599px) { .ads-wrapper { width: 510px; margin: auto; } .ads-responsive { transform: scale(0.7); transform-origin: 0; } } @media screen and (min-width: 488px) and (max-width: 524px) { .ads-wrapper { width: 473px; margin: auto; } .ads-responsive { transform: scale(0.65); transform-origin: 0; } } @media screen and (min-width: 450px) and (max-width: 487px) { .ads-wrapper { width: 437px; margin: auto; } .ads-responsive { transform: scale(0.6); transform-origin: 0; } } @media screen and (min-width: 415px) and (max-width: 449px) { .ads-wrapper { width: 400px; margin: auto; } .ads-responsive { transform: scale(0.55); transform-origin: 0; } } @media screen and (min-width: 380px) and (max-width: 414px) { .ads-wrapper { width: 365px; margin: auto; } .ads-responsive { transform: scale(0.5); transform-origin: 0; } } @media screen and (min-width: 345px) and (max-width: 379px) { .ads-wrapper { width: 328px; margin: auto; } .ads-responsive { transform: scale(0.45); transform-origin: 0; } } @media screen and (max-width: 344px) { .ads-wrapper { width: 255px; margin: auto; } .ads-responsive { transform: scale(0.35); transform-origin: 0; } }
